dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Cody Media
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern, 

I work at Seancody.com. It was brought to our attention that few of your members have downloaded our videos, and images and are promoting them on your site. This is completely unacceptable. I am pretty sure that you are not aware of this, however, we need to figure out a way so that you know which ones are our images and that they are taken down IMMEDIATELY. All images under the name Sean Cody should be taken down immediately. I do not want to escalate this situation and to get our attorneys involved. Your cooperation in this matter is greatly appreciated.

We have all rights to ALL Seancody images. No one other than us (Cody Media) is allowed to copy, distribute and profit from these videos. 

Not only is it illegal for your firm to post adult content without the 2257 information, you're also directly violating our copyright of Cody Media When t comes to the pirating of our video and images, we take these matters seriously. What are your future plans for insuring that our content not only doesn't appear on your website, but stays off? 

Here's site and the permalinks you require. 

http://allofgay.blogspot.com/

The same images can be found on Seancody.com . We are the owners of these images that being used on your website. 
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its and or the law. 

I swear, under the penalty of perjury, that the information is the notification is accurate and I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Yune Nielsen
